name: Space Racer (PIndustries)
description:
Dodge the wreckages and asteroids and get to the landing pad. Navigate your spaceship through the endless galaxy complete with dangers. Collect supply boxes and batteries on the way and increase your level. 

Do you want to have fun and show your skills? Then this game is absolutely for you.

Space Racer combines the runner game genre with good graphics and levels that need skills to beat them. 

Are you ready to fly through the galaxy?

Just so you know, the game is currently in active development and only has three levels as of right now. I am constantly working to improve it and have plans to add more levels, environments, and a shop system. Every bit of feedback is very welcome!
